Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Component
    Components are the parts of units that have armour and weapons.
    Damageable
    An interface for damageable objects.
    DamageRecord
    Records damage from a weapon to a component.
    Direction
    A direction in the hexagonal, flat top/bottom map.
    FiringStrategy
    A firing strategy is used to allow some weapons to be single shot and others to fire in clusters.
    LineOfSightStrategy
    Line of sight strategy, to compute the line of sight modifier.
    MapFactory  
    Memento
    Generic memento interface to store and restore the state of an originator object.
    Movable  
    Originator
    Generic originator interface to produce a memento to store the state of an object.
    Unit
    Unit interface.
    UnitBuilder
    Unit builder interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractUnit
    Abstract unit, providing full implementation of movement methods.
    ClusterFiringStrategy
    Cluster firing strategy.
    Cruise
    Cruising movement, this is the slowest form of movement but allows backwards movement.
    Destroyed
    Record a destroyed component.
    DiceRoller
    A dice roller is a collection of dice that can be rolled and the total computed.
    Die
    This class represents a single die of any Dn size.
    DirectFireStrategy
    Direct fire strategy, affected by terrain.
    Flank
    Flanking movement, this is the fastest form of movement but does not allow backwards movement.
    Halt
    Do not move.
    Hex
    Represents a coordinate in a hexagonal grid.
    HexMap
    Class that represents rectangular map with hexagonal tiles.
    Hit
    Record a hit.
    IndirectFireStrategy
    Indirect fire strategy, unaffected by terrain.
    MapLoader  
    Mech
    A walking mech unit.
    MechBuilder
    A mech builder.
    Miss
    Record a miss.
    Movement
    Base of all movement types that are used to initiate a move for a unit.
    MovementFactory
    Factory to store movement point spec's and construct movement objects.
    NormalFiringStrategy
    Normal firing strategy, single shot weapons.
    North
    North direction.
    NorthEast
    North east direction.
    NorthWest
    North west direction.
    NullComponent
    A NULL component.
    Player
    A player class.
    RandomSingleton
    Provides a singleton of the Random object.
    RealComponent
    A real component.
    South
    South direction.
    SouthEast
    South east direction.
    SouthWest
    South west direction.
    Tile
    A terrain tile that controls movement and visibility cost.
    TileFactory
    A factory for the Tile class that uses the Flyweight pattern to allow an entire map of tiles to be made.
    UnitFactory
    A factory for the Unit class.
    Vehicle
    A ground vehicle unit.
    VehicleBuilder
    A vehicle builder.
    Weapon
    Represents a weapon that can be stored in a component of a unit.
    WeaponFactory
    A factory for the Weapon class that uses the Flyweight pattern to allow many of the same type of weapons to be made cheaply.
    WeaponRange
    Weapon range specification and range modifier calculations.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MovementPointsExhaustedException
    An exception to be thrown when a unit has exhausted it's movement points.
